mapper.update: UPDATE tb_reserve SET reserve_id = #{reserveId} WHERE reserve_id = #{reserveId};
mapper.select: SELECT r.reserve_id, p.state, p.payment_date, p.amount, lp.img, l.title, ls.session_date FROM tb_reserve r INNER JOIN tb_payment p ON r.reserve_id = p.reserve_id INNER JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id INNER JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id INNER JOIN tb_lecture_photo lp ON ls.lecture_id = lp.lecture_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
